name: MRTG Addons for DSL Modems
short_description: Two Perl scripts for use as addons for MRTG.  Both scripts provide information about a home DSL network (which usually don't have SNMP agents).  The first is a latency/"bandwidth" monitor that uses ping.  Unlike similar MRTG addons, it uses traceroute to "autoconfigure" itself with the IPs of hops to a target, rather than hardcoding them.  The second script uses the web-interface found in most DSL modems to collect connectivity status and DSL connection metrics (e.g. SNR margin).
